channel.title: Perhaps A new Mystic Ability. (Possible dead gossip)
channel.description:
Give this ability to mystic:
Abyssal Dreams: 1 Use, Day Ability
> See all gossip results of the dead players found the night before the day this ability was used. Unable to be used before D3. But also can't read any evil or neutral feedback. Any defiled targets still will not show their results.
> Reason Why I feel like this should be a ability.
I Feel sorry for the investigatives and everyone else with leads that die. That is of the blue dragon factions. I know. No dead interaction. But I felt like this would be mainly a very interesting ability to add. I know. These are horrible. But, I wanted to try and make a possible chance to make BD investigatives die with the possibility of hope
